title: Walz blasts ICE, Trump after fatal shooting
shortDescription: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz slams President Trump and ICE over another fatal shooting by federal agents in Minneapolis.

title: Twice in three hours, Trump warns Canada on China deal: '100% Tariffs'
shortDescription: Trump has been incensed with Carney ever since his attention-grabbing speech at Davos describing a 'rupture' in the world order.

title: Trump to skip Super Bowl, bashes Bad Bunny and Green Day
shortDescription: The president told the New York Post the big game is "just too far away" to attend.

title: Trump says Venezuelan oil is already coming into US refineries
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said in an interview with the New York Post that Venezuelan oil is being processed in American refineries.

title: 'Some controversial people.' See who's on Trump's new Board of Peace
shortDescription: Trump's board includes people charged with war crimes and unelected rulers accused of widespread human rights violations.

title: Trump administration prepares for monster winter storm
shortDescription: President Trump, who plans to remain in Washington over the weekend, is being briefed regularly about the storm, the White House said.

title: Does new ICE policy violate the Fourth Amendment? What to know.
shortDescription: A constitutional law expert called the new ICE policy authorizing agents to enter homes without a judge's warrant a "violation of fundamental rights.”

title: Did the White House alter a photo of a Minnesota protester?
shortDescription: A post from the White House X account showed what appeared to be a manipulated image of a woman arrested over a protest at a Minnesota church.

title: Jack Smith tells Congress Trump 'engaged in criminal activity'
shortDescription: Former U.S. Special Counsel Jack Smith told a House panel that Trump was "looking for ways to stay in power" following his defeat in the 2020 election

title: Trump's son-in-law unveils Gaza development plan with skyscrapers
shortDescription: By 2024, the Israel-Hamas war had pushed millions of Gazans into poverty and food insecurity.

title: Trump floats three designs for his 'Independence Arch' in DC
shortDescription: President Trump released renderings of three different designs for the arch he wants built on the National Mall near the Lincoln Memorial.

title: Trump drops new designs for giant DC arch
shortDescription: President Donald Trump shared three designs for a new arch he's planning on the National Mall in Washington, D.C.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Averages slump amid Greenland fight
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has officially been back in office for one year. What do Americans think of his job performance? See his approval rating.

title: Barron Trump made emergency call in UK woman's alleged assault
shortDescription: Barron Trump, the son of President Donald Trump, called police to report an alleged assault in the UK last year, according to multiple reports.

title: Trump can't deport foreign students based on speech, judge rules
shortDescription: A federal judge has formally ordered the Trump administration to cease efforts to deport foreign-born students over pro-Palestinian speech.

title: White House faces skeptical judge in lawsuit over Trump ballroom
shortDescription: A judge sharply questioned whether President Donald Trump had authority to proceed with a $400-million White House ballroom.

title: First lady opening NY Stock Exchange ahead of 'Melania' movie release
shortDescription: Melania Trump's appearance in New York on Jan. 28 comes ahead of a Jan. 30 release of a documentary about her on Amazon Prime Video.
